cause.description:
P.T. Anderson is the acclaimed director of such films as: Magnolia, Boogie Nights, and Punch Drunk Love. His films have a unique quality and tone, and they are have the right to be appreciated on so many higher levels. Please join...
1. Watch His Films
2. Analyze Plot Development and Camera Angles
3. Praise His Films
4. Be Happy.
cause.name: P.T. Anderson is Filmmaking God, too
